Detailed Description

seDRMLightRenderingBehaviour wraps the DRM <Light_Rendering_Behaviour> abstract class.

Note:
This is an ABSTRACT DRM class.
Author:
Warren Macchi
Version:
Revision: 1.8
See also:
seDRMBase

Member Function Documentation

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMLightRenderingBehaviour::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference (especially because this is an abstract DRM class).
Returns:
SE_CLS_DRM_LIGHT_RENDERING_BEHAVIOUR
